title: alimnts
author: alimnts
created_time: February 02, 2023, 08:18:00 AMLast edit: February 05, 2023, 05:04:54 PM by alimnts
content: General information about the house is available in the ad.The total price I want is 117 eth.This may vary depending on the eth price.https://www.sahibinden.com/ilan/emlak-konut-satilik-sahibinden-satilik-2-plus1-daire-metrobuse-1-dakika-komisyonsuz-1076553102/detay/I can answer any questions you want to ask.For foreigners, there is also a chance to obtain citizenship.The reason I am selling this house is to fulfill another dream of mine.edit1:features translated to english1 minute to Metrobus, 2 minutes to Torium AVM, Wednesday market on 3 upper street, 3-4 big markets nearby, 3-4 schools within 3-4 minutes, yellow minibuses right across the thermal facility, right across the first stop, 3- I am selling my flat, which has a very valuable location in the open location where 4 big hospitals and universities are located.The apartment is sunny from midday until sunset in the evening. It is a mezzanine apartment on the 3rd floor, do not confuse it with the ground floor apartments. Rental income is around 500$ – 550$. The condominium was purchased. It's not one of the unfinished flats in the vicinity. Good luck to the buyer. There is a small market share.for foreignersTurkey is a tourism country. Therefore, the person who will buy the apartment can obtain citizenship and benefit from the tourism regions in the country for life.A few videos about Turkey promotionhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7yqtW4Isechttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7A1q7v4btbkhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AbBFmzl_EK0

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Good luck in selling your house, aside from posting it here in the forum and your local forum. Look for some other platforms like social media and other crypto groups in your locale to place this ad. This will certainly get the attention for those that have been finding a way to spend their ETH and wanting to buy a house. Anyway, I hope you find the buyer and this sale proceeds with someone who is able to take it with your asking price.

comments.author: alimnts
comments.body: Quote from: sunsilk on February 02, 2023, 08:30:28 AMGood luck in selling your house, aside from posting it here in the forum and your local forum. Look for some other platforms like social media and other crypto groups in your locale to place this ad. This will certainly get the attention for those that have been finding a way to spend their ETH and wanting to buy a house. Anyway, I hope you find the buyer and this sale proceeds with someone who is able to take it with your asking price. Thank you very much for your nice thoughts.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: alimnts on February 02, 2023, 08:18:00 AMhttps://www.sahibinden.com/ilan/.........Whatever you want to describe on this link, could you repost it somewhere else too (or this forum is preferred to be precise) and in English? It's kind of annoying if someone has to register first just to see the content, especially since you want it to reach a global audience of crypto users and expect one of them as a potential buyer.

comments.author: alimnts
comments.body: Quote from: noorman0 on February 04, 2023, 03:07:17 AMQuote from: alimnts on February 02, 2023, 08:18:00 AMhttps://www.sahibinden.com/ilan/.........Whatever you want to describe on this link, could you repost it somewhere else too (or this forum is preferred to be precise) and in English? It's kind of annoying if someone has to register first just to see the content, especially since you want it to reach a global audience of crypto users and expect one of them as a potential buyer.you are absolutely right. Since I don't speak English, I thought it would be better for users to use the translation. but i will try to translate it as much as i can.

comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: I'll be happy to view the house details on another link. Also, hopefully, you are okay and the recent earthquake has had no effect on you or the house.

comments.author: alimnts
comments.body: Quote from: steve5946 on February 10, 2023, 10:59:28 AMI'll be happy to view the house details on another link. Also, hopefully, you are okay and the recent earthquake has had no effect on you or the house.The earthquake occurred at the farthest point from us. There is no material damage, but we are sad spiritually. another link I couldn't understand it. The link above is not opening for you?

comments.author: Tespata
comments.body: See your decision I was very worried Because I didn't get success by investing huge amount of dollars Of course, if you ever get a big pump while holding Ether, you can build a few houses with the Ether you sell.Congratulations on your investment Unfortunately I can't buy your house even though I want to because I'm out of Turkey Best of luck to you
